{"blocks":[{"key":"2m168","text":"Remove iPSC stock cryovial from liquid nitrogen and thaw in   bead bath. Thaw quickly by gently swirling until a small piece of frozen material remains. Spray the vial with 70% ethanol before transferring to a biological safety cabinet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ag16j","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e12ah","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chkho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ges7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EE82561EF54E11EBB4DB0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":138,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"5s030","text":"Since DMSO is toxic to cells at room temperature, perform the following steps in a time-efficient manner to obtain optimal cell viability.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj84n","text":"Incubate for   at   or   at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":23,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8mv6i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gacl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5osci","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vo9p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"AC71E2F0F56C11EB93344BC1AC930DC2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B5CC24A0F56C11EB93344BC1AC930DC2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":480,"guid":"BC0CCA40F56C11EB93344BC1AC930DC2","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C1962DD0F56C11EB93344BC1AC930DC2","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"4":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":74,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"2vga8","text":"The time can vary by cell line and density (the optimal density is 70-90%)","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9m9er","text":"Aspirate EDTA solution, the cells colonies should remain attached so be careful not to disturb them.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fin0i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ba3ue","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"akma8","text":"Typically splitting ratios for 6 well plates are between 1:6 and 1:12, so, add the desire volume of culture medium to the cells and discard any excess of cells or re-plate into a new Matrigel or Vitronectin-coated well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68du0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9m49m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bqj5","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet in culture medium E8 supplemented with   Chroman I.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4qjc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ldk2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h3el","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FD2D5F40F57511EBB3CF7149F134AABE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"362nh","text":"When the well is 80% confluent pass to achieve an assay or to expand stock.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"135u9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b2q07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a40fd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"91ib4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akp2p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32f56","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":134,"offset":0,"style":"italic"}],"key":"2f805","text":"KOLF2.1 iPSC does not behave well when is more than 80-90%, most of the cells will die and it will be very difficult to get them back.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"164B7790F57711EBB3CF7149F134AABE"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fmedg","text":"Coating plates with Matrigel solution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ccbk","text":"Reconstitute a   aliquot of Matrigel in   of cold KnockOut™ DMEM/F-12, pipet    cold media into the aliquot of Matrigel tube and pipet up and down several times, then transfer what has thawed to the tube containing    of cold KnockOut™ DMEM/F-12, repeat until the frozen aliquot of Matrigel has been completely transferred to the 50 ml of cold media. Mix inverting several times.
